018package org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc;
019
020import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
021import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.format;
022
023import javax.lang.model.element.Element;
024import java.util.EnumSet;
025import java.util.List;
026import java.util.Set;
027import java.util.regex.Pattern;
028import java.util.regex.PatternSyntaxException;
029
030import org.apiguardian.api.API;
031import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
032import com.sun.source.doctree.DocTree;
033import jdk.javadoc.doclet.Taglet;
034
035/**
036 *  This inline tag inserts an HTML anchor into the documentation that can be
037 *  used for references to the location of that anchor. It can be used as this:
038 *  <pre><code>&hellip; {&#64;anchor #&lt;<i>anchor</i>&gt; &lt;<i>text</i>&gt;} &hellip;</code></pre>
039 *  That allows to reference the &lt;text&gt; by the anchor &lt;anchor&gt;
040 *  like this:
041 *  <pre><code>&hellip; &lt;a href=&quot;#anchor&quot;&gt;&hellip;&lt;/a&gt; &hellip;</code></pre>
042 *  Or, with the {@code href} tag:
043 *  <pre><code>&hellip; {&#64;href #anchor &hellip;}</code></pre>
044 *
045 *  @note   The hash symbol (&quot;#&quot;) before the anchor name is
046 *      mandatory!
047 *
048 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
049 *  @version $Id: AnchorTaglet.java 890 2021-04-01 21:15:48Z tquadrat $
050 *  @since 0.0.5
051 *
052 *  @see HRefTaglet
053 *
054 *  @UMLGraph.link
055 */
056@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: AnchorTaglet.java 890 2021-04-01 21:15:48Z tquadrat $" )
057@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.5" )
058public final class AnchorTaglet implements Taglet
059{
060        /*-----------*\
061    ====** Constants **========================================================
062        \*-----------*/
063    /**
064     *  The name of this taglet: {@value}.
065     */
066    public static final String TAGLET_NAME = "anchor";
067
068        /*------------------------*\
069    ====** Static Initialisations **===========================================
070        \*------------------------*/
071    /**
072     *  The pattern for the tag.
073     */
074    private static final Pattern PATTERN;
075
076    static
077    {
078        try
079        {
080            //noinspection RegExpRedundantEscape
081            PATTERN = Pattern.compile( "\\{@" + TAGLET_NAME + " #(?<name>.*?) (?<contents>.*)\\}" );
082        }
083        catch( final PatternSyntaxException e )
084        {
085            throw new ExceptionInInitializerError( e );
086        }
087    }
088
089        /*--------------*\
090    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
091        \*--------------*/
092    /**
093     *  Creates a new {@code AnchorTaglet} instance.
094     */
095    @SuppressWarnings( "RedundantNoArgConstructor" )
096    public AnchorTaglet() { /* Just exists */ }
097
098        /*---------*\
099    ====** Methods **==========================================================
100        \*---------*/
101    /**
102     *  {@inheritDoc}
103     */
104    @Override
105    public final Set<Location> getAllowedLocations() { return EnumSet.allOf( Location.class ); }
106
107    /**
108     *  {@inheritDoc}
109     */
110    @Override
111    public final String getName() { return TAGLET_NAME; }
112
113    /**
114     *  {@inheritDoc}
115     */
116    @Override
117    public final boolean isInlineTag() { return true; }
118
119    /**
120     *  {@inheritDoc}
121     */
122    @Override
123    public final String toString( final List<? extends DocTree> tags, final Element element )
124    {
125        final var tag = tags.get( 0 ).toString();
126        final var matcher = PATTERN.matcher( tag );
127        final var retValue = matcher.matches() ? format( "<a id=\"%2$s\">%1$s</a>", matcher.group( "contents" ), matcher.group( "name" ) ) : tag;
128
129        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
130        return retValue;
131    }   //  toString()
132}
133//  class AnchorTaglet
134
135/*
136 *  End of File
137 */
